title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A legendary 35mm film camera from the 1950s, renowned for its precision, durability, and classic design — a must-have for collectors and photographers.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: An iconic electric guitar with a powerful sound and sleek double-cutaway body. A prized instrument for serious musicians and collectors.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple’s first personal computer with a GUI. This piece of tech history is a rare collector’s item from the dawn of modern computing.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: A timeless diver’s watch known for its durability, style, and prestige. Stainless steel build with classic black dial — a luxury icon.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: An iconic furniture piece blending luxury and comfort. Crafted with molded wood and leather — a standout in any interior setting.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition of the American classic. This literary treasure is highly sought after by collectors and literature enthusiasts alike.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Authentic screen print by the elusive street artist Banksy. A powerful piece of modern art with immense cultural and collector value.
